div.p:
Curia Capitalis Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
die mensis Januarij Anno Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo Septimo Quo die
Sectis vocatis curia affirmata absentes patent et cetera

Johannes Watsone in garntuly
andreas Watsone in cullan
thomas Daneson
Alexander Joffrasone
Alexander leitht
Robertus Dauysone in banquhory de vny
Willelmus Richerdsone in fordys'
thomas laysk in newsone newburghe
lyngus Wat in Durnecabok
Andreas baxter in newburgh'
Richardus Watsone in fordys'
Dauid andersone in cullan
andreas Jhonsone in fingask
alexander Sanchar in mar
Johannes mar in Dys'
thomas Wodman
Johannes Wilyesone in cromar
georgeus Johnsone
Dauid hay in fordys'
Willelmus lindesay
Willelmus laisk
Johannes herroun'
Johannes Richersone in Ellone
Andreas gordone
Williame bynne

The said' day gilbert menyeis prouest and the Counsale of the said' burghe one
that ane part Ande Williame Colp on that vthir part bande and oblist thame lelely
and treuly be the handis of the said prouest in the tovnis name And' the said' Wil
yeame for him selff to stand and abid at the deliuerance and ordinance of my
lord of Abirdene anent the clame of ane thrid partis fisching of ane nethis one
the watir of Done clamit and persewit be the said Williame and' in ale pontis
and articulis contenit in our soueran' lordis lettres of summondis maid at the In
stance of the said William apone the said toune and' oblist thame to of ale
thar diligens be baitht the said partijs to caus his lordschip to tak the said'
matir to him and' to deliuer tharuntill for the quhilkis the said' William continevit
his summond' maid apone the said' thoune and to my lord of Abirdenis heir
cumin

head.add: Anent the pament of thre barrellis Salmond yerlie to Dauid Colp et cetera

div.p:
The said' day the haile takismen and possessouris of the wattiris and fischingis
of the said' burghe' being present for the tyme grauntit and Consentit to pay
yerlie Ilkan yer' this money to the pament of thre barrellis salmond' yerlie Dauid
Colp Induring the termes of fyve yeris for this generale assedacioun' Instant that
is to say Ilkane Josar and possessor of ane half nethis fisching of the Raik
sale pay yerlie iiijor s' tharof iiijor now in hande Ande yerlie iiijor s'
with thar maile Induring the sa Remanent of the saide fiwe yeris Ilkane brukar
and Josaris of ane half neth' of the midchingile sale pay xxxj d' yerlie with thar
maile Ilkan Josaris of ane hald nethis of the pot ij s' in hande and yerlie
ij s' with thar maile Ilkane demi nethis of the furdis xvj d' in hande and yerlie
xvj d' with thar maile the Josaris and brukaris of Ilkan demi nethis fischingis
of Done iiijor s' in hande and yerlie iiijor s' with thar maile Induring
the termes of the saide assedacioun' Ande Ilkane Sext partis fischingis
of the Crovis ij s' in hande and ij s' yerlie with thar maile as said Is Excepe
Jonhne of Cullane and Johne Colisone quhilkis disassentit tharto vpone the
quhilkis gilbert menyeis prouest askit Instrument at me ser Johne Stirueling
notar Testibus Dauid menyeis domino de Warderis domino Johanne ruthirfurd Andrea
Cullane Alexandro mar' Johanne mar' thoma leslie Alexandro gray et cetera

The saide day the balyeis Assignit friday that nixt Cumis to ser Androu
Colisone to Comper befor thame that thai mycht ger' warne the possessouris
of the lande of vmquhile Williame nory to the said' day to se gif
thai walde ourquyt and redempe the saide lande and pay the annuellis
aving one It that thai mycht minister Justice to the saide ser Johne Androw
anent the Sesin to to be gevin to him of the saide lande eftir the tenor
of the process lede tharapon'

Be It kend' Tile ale mene be thir present lettres ws aldirman bailyes counsale and communite
of abirdene to haue set ande to maile lattin Ande be thir present lettres settis and to maile lattis
to Dauid Colp our conburges ale and' haile our fichingis of ane half neth' of
the mydchingile one wattir of Dee for ale the termes of fiwe yeris becaus
the said Dauid hed' ane half nettis fisching of the said wattir of mydchingile
of ws in tak be for this last generale assedacioun' of the said' burgh'
instant To be haldin and' hed' ale and' haile our said hald nettis
fisching with the pertinence to the said Dauid his ayris and' assignais nay gritar
of pouer thane him self induellaris of the said' burgh' with ale and sindrie
fredomes commodities asiamentis and proffitis pertening or may pertene tharto quhil
the sid fiwe yeris be runnyne The entray of the said Dauid his ayris
or assignez' ane or may nay gritar than him self induellaris of the
said burgh' salbe in and with the said half nettis fisching with the pertinence
one the vigile of Sanctandrois in the yer' of god ane thowsand' fiwe
hundreth' and alevin yeris quhilk sawe the end' and wsche of the generale
assedacioun' of this burgh' instant And' frathinfurtht to continew in
peciabile Josin and breukin the samyn quhile ale the termes of fiwe
yeris haile and to gyddir be fullely complet and runnyn but ony Interrupcioun
or brek of termes of yeris questione' Impediment ordenannd' of ws or our successouris
to be maid' in the contrar' The said Dauid his ayris or assignez ane or may nay gritar
of pouer than him self Induellaris of the said burgh' payand till ws and our successouris
maile girssome and vthir dewities as vthiris our nychtbouris payis for siclik ane half
nethis fisching at the termes vsuale within the said burgh' alanerly for ale vthir thingis
that may be askit or requirit tharof Induring the said fiwe yeris And we the saide
aldirman baillies consaile and communite and our successouris sale warand' keip and defend'
ale and haile the said half nethis fisching with the pertinence to the said Dauid his ayris and
assignez ane or may nay gritar pouer than him self Induellaris of the said burgh'
for ale the termes of fiwe yeris in maner and forme as said is be ale our landis and gudis
ale fraud' and gile awayput In witnessing of the quhilkis our commone Seile
of the said burgh' is appensit to thir lettres at the said burgh' the tuenty day of the mo
netht of December the yeir of god' ane thousand' fiwe hundretht and Sevin yeris

Vniuersis pateat per presentes nos balliuos burgenses et communitatem burgi burgi de Abirdene vnano
consensu et assensu fecisse constituisse nominasse et ordinasse tenorem quod presencium facere consti
tuere nominare et ordinare nostros predilictos conburgenses gilbertum menyes tunc nostrum
prepositum Dauid menyes patrem suum Johannem ruthirfurde militem Johanne cullan et andream
Cullan nostros veros legittimos et Indubitatos commissarios dantes et concedentes eisdem nostram
plenariam et ominodam potestatem mandatum speciale pro nobis et nomine nostro ad
assedandum firmamque dimittendum Dauid Colp nostro vicesimo totas et Integras ab pista
rias nostras dimidij rethis de mydchingile super aquam de Dee pro terminis quinque
annuorum Inmediate complendorum post finem et terminum generalis assedacionis
nostre dictj burgj Instants Ceteraque omnia et singula faciendum et excercendum
In premisse que facere possemus si personaliter interessemus Promittens nos Ratum
gratum firmum et stabile habens et habiturum totum et quicquid dictj commissarij
nostri in premisse nomine nostro rite duxerint faciendum In cuius rej testimonium presentibus
sigillum nostrum communem appensum est apud dictum burgum vicesimo die mensis
Decembris Anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo Septimo

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes spens procurator
prioris et conuentus domus predicatorum dicti burgi et protestabatur in forma Juris
pro vno annuo redditu vj s' et viij d' monete scocie sibi et dicto loco a
longo tempore debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta anteriore quondam robertj
club Jacente in vico superiore ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vicj inter terram
Robertj Waus ex orientali ex vna et terram quondam henricj tulideff
ex occidentali partibus ab altera et terram interiorem domini Johannis ruthirfurd versus
austrum et communionem viam regiam versus boream Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in
sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius procesus testibus
alexandro Roche Andrea bawne et ormando lesly seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram prefatus frater Johannes spens procurator ut
supra et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu quinque solidorum
monete scocie dicto loco a longo tempore debito et non soluto de quadam
terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico Nauium ex orientali parte
eiusdem vicj inter terram alexandrj malisone ex orientali ex vna et
communionem viam regiam ex occidentali partibus ab altera et terram quondam
andree lammyntone versus austrum et communionem viam regiam versus boream
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius
processus vt supra

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Andreas storour'
prior domus fratrum carmilitarum dictj burgi et protestatus fuit in forma
Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum sibi et dicto loco
annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluet de quadam terra vasta quondam
Ranaldi tailyeour' Jacente extra portam orienalem dicti burgi ex boreali
parte vicj eiusdem inter terram Johannis yongsone ex orientali ex vna Et
terram domus sancti Johannis de torphichin ex occidentali et communionem viam
regiam versus austrum Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam
primo die huius processus testibus thoma Riddaill thoma straloche et Normando
lesly segeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Dauid
Walcar capellanus perpetuus altaris sancti leonardi situati infra
eccleisam perrochialem santi nicholaij de Aberdene de fundacione
quondam bone memorie Dauid Symsone et protestabatur in forma
Juris pro vno annuo redditu xxvj s' et octo denariorum monete scocie
sibi et dicti capellanie sue annuatim debito et a longo tempore
non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam thome cullan' Jacente
infra dictum burgum in vico le gastraw ex occidentali parte
eiusdem inter terram quondam dominj andree gray capel
lanj ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Duncanj clat ex boreali
partibu ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus oriens et torrentem
siue aqueductum molendinorum dicti burgi versus occidens
Ad quam teram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia
tanquam tercio die huius processus testibus alexandro
Johanne lister et andrea nachtie sergeando

Curia balliuorum burgj de Anirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xijo die mensis Januarij anno quo supra
The said day

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiij
die Januarij anno quo supra

The said day Dauid Wricht lauchfully warnit callit and' nocht comperit
to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be alexander roche for the wranguis'
intrometting and' a with certane tymmer et cetera

The said day the prouest bailyes counsail and' communite present for the
tyme grantit ande consentit to gif thar common seill tile Alexander roche
burges of the said burgh' for thar consent and' assent in the heretable
disponing ande setting in fewferme of p ane peice of waist land'
liand' in the grene betuix the land' of vmquhile robert clube one
the fourtht part And' ane waist land' of vmquhile alexander Kintor
one the northt part and the burnis one the est and west partis
be vmquhile master alexander fyf chapellane of our lady alter
to Johnne fynne for fourty pennis in the yer' becaus' the said Johnne
is bundin his ayris ande assignez' to pay the said xl d' yerly
and' has ekit xvj d' quhar it gef bot ij s' obefor for the
proffit of the said alter considering thai ar patronis thar to

The said day the borgh' fundin be Williame mar one androw skynner
for the wranguis inputting of certane skynnis in the said Williame
is pot and' out takin of the samyne but leif of him was fundin
of nane awaile be ane suorne assis' Williame rolland' forspekar
for the quhilkis the said Williame mar was in amerciament of the court et cetera

The said day androw Wricht was fundin quyt of ane sourerd'
follouit and' clamyt be sande ramsay

The said day Wat thomesone lauchfully warnit callit and nocht
comperit tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Dauid lam'
for the wranuigs' withhaldin fra him of a xj s' and' vj d' for
the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court et cetera

The said day androw edindeauch' lauchfully warnit callit and
nocht comperit tile ansuer at the Instance of Robert piper for ane par' of
Schovne of ewill Stuff et cetera for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament

The said day Dauid steuart one that ane part and' Johnne' of murray on'
that vthir part was oblist and suorne be the faithtis of thar bodiis to stand'
and abid at the finale decret ordinance and' deliuerance of thir personis
vnder writin arbitouris and amicabile componitouris that is to say Dauid
menyeis and gilbert menyeis prouest chosin for the said Dauid steuart
alexander gray and gavane murray chosin for the said Johnne of
murray anent the clame of tua franche crovnis xliiij eduard' grotis
and half ane Inglis groit clamyt be the said Johnne' of murray and'
anent ale vthir clamis and debatis debatable betuix tham The saidis
Dauid steuart and' Johnne murray bringand with thame ale writis euidencis
and documentis quhilkis thai haue and wile wse in the said matir the saidis arbitouris
and' amicabile componitouris beand suorn' to decret and' deliuer the said matir and
thai to deliuer betuix this and' the day xv dais and to giffurtht thar decret and'
deliuerance heruntill eftir thar aithtis and consciens be the said day et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxjo
die Januarij anno quo supra

The said day Dauid straloch' tuk to preive this day viij dais that
robert is aWaus is awand' to him xvj s' and' the said robert tuk
to preive the said day that the said Dauid is awand' to him v
s' for ane berne maile

The said day the borgh' fundin be robert piper and Johnne piper
common menstralis vpoun' Dauid treis for the wranguis withhaldin fra thame of
thar dietis yerly ande thar fee was fundin awaile et cetera for
the quhilk It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' cristofer
prat forspekar that the said Dauid was in ane amerciament
of the court et cetera And' aw to pay to thame yerly xviij d' Nocht
withstanding the aldirman and' ballies defalkit ij d' yerlie
and say the said Dauid sale pay to the said menstrellis
xvj yerly

The said day robert allone was conuict be ane suorne
assis' criste prat forspekar for tribulance of Duncane
murray ande the said Duncan was conuict for the tribu
lance of the said robert for the quhilkis Ilk ane of tham
was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera Atour thai
ordanit the said robert to pay half ane pund' of wax
to haly blud licht and' gif euer he committis sik tribu
lance in tyme to cum he sale pay v s' to sanct nicholes
wark

The said day it was statut and' orcanit be the aldirman
ballies and counsaile present for the tyme that ale the
baxteris of this burgh' sale furnis' the toun' with breid'
of quhit and' baik breid' for ij s' gud' cleyne fresch'
sufficient stuf weill boutit and' baikin weyand' xxij
vncez and penny breid weyand xj vncez witht consent
ande assent of the baxteris of this burgh' present for the tyme

The said day the borgh' fundin one Johnne andirsone be thomas
lask in the newburgh' for the wranguis withhaldin fra him of
xiij s' iiij d' of maile was fundin awaile be ane suorn'
assis' recheart Waus forspekar for the quhilkis the said'
Johnne was in amerciament of the court et cetera and' aw to
pay the said maile

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij
die mensis Januarij anno quo supra

The said day mastir thomas chamer chaplane of our lady altar
one that ane part and Johnne fynne one that vthir part band' and'
oblist thame be the faitht of thair bodiis to stand and abid at the
deliuerance of gilbert menyeis prouest ser Johnne stirueling Johnne
mar and thomas Waus anent the clame of a land pertenyng to the
said alter be resone of proces' led tharupon' and clamit be the said'
Johnne fynne set to him be mastir alexander fif quhilk personis sale
gif y furtht thar deliuerance in the said said matir be aucht dais
eftir candilmes hereftir and' gif neid be to cheis' tham' an' oure
man be at thar avin wile and' deliuer tharuntile eftir thar consciens
